channel.title: [REQ]Left Handed Items![REQ]
channel.description: Hey guys, Just wondering whether anyone could make some models and INTS with the models already G-zipped and Crap... The Item I want is a Dragon Dagger but in your left hand instead of the right. So it looks like I'm holding A dagger in Left hand And I'm holding "Fallen Angel" in my other hand..( A Sword By Dyan_0789 ) <Username is something like that Thanks!>

item.title: [REQ]Left Handed Items![REQ]
item.dc:creator: @Surfr Surfr
item.description:
@Surfr wrote:

recker450:

move it to left position and add the id to the shield slot in item.java

It wouldnt be a weapon though, it would be a shield that looks like a wep.

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ]Left Handed Items![REQ]
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

[quote=“Hellman1, post:7, topic:266346”]Left handers make up only a fraction of the world’s population… And a fraction of a fraction in small communities such as this. I believe most places on the internet are fascist, and if you try to make the importance of the individual higher than they like…

Well, things like WW2 happen :)[/quote]
Left handed people are more common now than before. im left handed. over 1/2 the people i work with are left handed. and many people at my school are left handed. im pretty sure left handed people wont rise up and try to kill all right handed people.

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ]Left Handed Items![REQ]
item.dc:creator: @Surfr Surfr
item.description:
@Surfr wrote:

Its easy tbh.

You could make the weapon right handed but show up as the shield on your char, but this would mean you wouldn’t be able to wear a shield. (Unless you made a shield to go into the right hand)

If you make a weapon and make it go in the shield slot, it wouldnt be classed as a weapon, it would be a shield, that looks a like a weapon. - Wouldn’t cause damage or anything.

Thinking about it now, you would have to make custom animations for your left hand weapon/right hand shield. I think i could do it, and you’ve enspired me, i’m gonna make the two.

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ]Left Handed Items![REQ]
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

[quote=“koolgordon, post:1, topic:266346”]Hey guys,
Just wondering whether anyone could make some models and INTS with the models already G-zipped and Crap…
The Item I want is a Dragon Dagger but in your left hand instead of the right.
So it looks like I’m holding A dagger in Left hand And I’m holding “Fallen Angel” in my other hand…( A Sword By Dyan_0789 ) <Username is something like that Thanks!>[/quote]

Sweet, so the release of the fallen angel/heavens fury wasnt just ignored by everyone.
About your question: you need to open the .mqo of the weapon, then move its position to wherever the left hand would be. then, open it in Datmaker and select the “Left Hand” animation

Read full topic
